statements.query: MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AWSLambda)<-[LAMBDA_VERSION_OF]-(n:AWSLambdaVersion) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AWSLambda)<-[r:LAMBDA_VERSION_OF]-(:AWSLambdaVersion) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AWSLambda)<-[r:ATTACHED_TO]-(:AWSLambdaLayerVersion) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AWSLambda)-[r:MEMBER_OF_AWS_VPC]->(:AWSVpc) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AWSLambda)-[r:MEMBER_OF_EC2_SECURITY_GROUP]->(:EC2SecurityGroup) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AWSLambda)-[r:PART_OF_SUBNET]->(:EC2Subnet) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(n:AWSLambda) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}})-[r:RESOURCE]->(:AWSLambda) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:AWSLambda)-[r:STS_ASSUME_ROLE_ALLOW]->(:AWSPrincipal) WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE r return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
